set.name: DMBD-06 Chronicle Legacy Deck 2018: Divine Temple of the Zenith

card.name: Owen the Road, Zenith of "The End"

property.name: Race
property.value: Demon Command/Unknown/Zenith

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature, shuffle all cards in your graveyard into your deck. Then you may shieldify the top 3 cards of your deck. ■ When one of your creatures would leave, you may return 2 of your shields to your hand instead. You can't use the "shield trigger".

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-06 Chronicle Legacy Deck 2018: Divine Temple of the Zenith

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Unknown/Zenith

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature, put any number of non-evolution creatures that have "blocker" from your hand. ■ Whenever you put a creature that has "blocker", you may draw a card.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-06 Chronicle Legacy Deck 2018: Divine Temple of the Zenith

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. Then your opponent chooses one of your shields. You may break that shield. ■ Each of your cards in your shield zone gets "shield trigger". {ETERNAL OMEGA} (When this creature would leave, return it to your hand instead.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Victory Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-06 Chronicle Legacy Deck 2018: Divine Temple of the Zenith

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} {ETERNAL OMEGA} (When this creature would leave, return it to your hand instead.) ■ When you summon this creature, during your opponent's next turn, each of your opponent's creatures attacks if able. ■ Whenever one of your other creatures would battle one of your opponent's creatures, this creature battles instead. ■ Your opponent can't choose this creature. (It can still be attacked and blocked.)

property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature, return all your opponent's creatures to their owners' hands. ■ Whenever your opponent would put a command or dragon, put it into their graveyard instead. {ETERNAL OMEGA} (When this creature would leave, return it to your hand instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature, your opponent chooses a total of 4 cards from their hand and/or creatures in the battle zone and shieldifies them. ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into their graveyard instead. {ETERNAL OMEGA} (When this creature would leave, return it to your hand instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each card in your opponent's mana zone. It can't cost 0 or less. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature into the battle zone, return up to 2 colorless cards from your mana zone or graveyard to your hand. {ETERNAL OMEGA} (When this creature would leave, return it to your hand instead.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.value: DMBD-06 Chronicle Legacy Deck 2018: Divine Temple of the Zenith

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ATTACK CHANCE}: Zenith (When one of your Zeniths attacks, you may cast this spell for no cost.) ■ One of your creatures in the battle zone gets +50000 power, "world breaker" and "Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may untap it." until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "world breaker" breaks all your opponent's shields.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.value: DMBD-06 Chronicle Legacy Deck 2018: Divine Temple of the Zenith

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ATTACK CHANCE}: Unknown (When one of your Unknowns attacks, you may cast this spell for no cost.) ■ You may summon a creature that has both Zenith and Unknown races from your hand for no cost. At the end of the turn, return that creature to your hand.

card.name: Miller's Hollow, Suspicious Tiger Wolf / Art Thou an Unknown?

property.name: Name1
property.value: Miller's Hollow, Suspicious Tiger Wolf

property.name: Name2
property.value: Art Thou an Unknown?

property.name: Race
property.value: Demon Command/Unknown

property.name: Race1
property.value: Demon Command/Unknown

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put an Unknown and a spell from among them into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. TWINPACT ■ Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put an Unknown and a spell from among them to your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules1
Rules2
property.value: ■ Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put an Unknown and a spell from among them to your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-06 Chronicle Legacy Deck 2018: Divine Temple of the Zenith

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Draw a card. Then reveal a card in your hand. Tap all your opponent's creatures that costs the same as or less than that card. If the revealed card is a Zenith, the tapped creatures doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-06 Chronicle Legacy Deck 2018: Divine Temple of the Zenith

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may return a shield to your hand. However, you can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield. ■ You may shieldify a card from your hand. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-06 Chronicle Legacy Deck 2018: Divine Temple of the Zenith

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Shuffle your deck, then reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Zenith creature, you may summon it for no cost. If it's not a Zenith creature, add it to your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-06 Chronicle Legacy Deck 2018: Divine Temple of the Zenith

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-06 Chronicle Legacy Deck 2018: Divine Temple of the Zenith

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ If your opponent has more cards in his mana zone than you have in yours, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone.
